HomePage.title: Faculty of Computers and Information Students Platform, Tanta University
HomePage.description: We provide you with a comprehensive platform to manage assignments, messages, comments, and university events with ease.

services.title: Our Services
services.pdfDescription: We provide concise and practical PDF summaries to make studying easier.
services.quizDescription: Test yourself with a variety of quizzes according to the subject.
services.exercisesDescription: Solved exercises and problems to help you understand deeply and apply knowledge.
services.examsDescription: Collections of previous exams for effective training and preparation.

plans.premiumFeature2: Access to all PDFs and materials

AboutPage.title: Faculty of Computers and Information Students Platform
AboutPage.intro1: We provide a comprehensive platform designed specifically for students of Tanta University's Faculty of Computers and Information. Easily manage your assignments, messages, comments, and university events â€” all in one convenient place.
AboutPage.intro2: Our mission is to support students throughout their entire learning lifecycle by offering practical tools and resources that simplify studying and enhance communication. We continuously develop the platform to be scalable and adaptable, aiming to serve students across all universities in Egypt in the near future.
AboutPage.futureDesc: We are committed to continuous development, aiming to scale our platform for use by all universities across Egypt. By creating a unified educational ecosystem, we hope to empower students nationwide to succeed in their academic journey with ease and support.

footer.description: We aim to provide the best educational services in a simple, effective, and enjoyable way for all students.
